column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I usually don't like going to any restaurant more than once. I always like trying new restaurants
column2: new flavors but I make exceptions for GREAT restaurants like Cafe Baba Reeba
column3: so far it's the best Tapas place in Chicago. I went there twice
column4: the only thing i hated about my second visit was the table
column5: it wasn't in the nice lower floor area like where we were seated the first time
column7: we didn't have reservation and it was super crowded.
